pas_http_user_done_login: You have been logged in successfully.
pas_http_user_done_profile_edit: The user profile has been edited successfully.
pas_http_user_done_registration: Your user registration has been completed successfully.
pas_http_user_done_registration_pending: A link has been sent to you via e-mail. Please use this link to confirm your user registration. Your information have been saved temporarily in the system.
pas_http_user_registration_pending_email: We want to welcome you once more on behalf of the whole team.
pas_http_user_done_change_profile: Your profile changes have been applied successfully.
pas_http_user_done_change_profile_pendin: A link has been sent to you via e-mail. Please use this link to confirm your profile changes.
pas_http_user_change_profile_pending_ema: Your profile changes require the validation of your e-mail address.
pas_http_user_sec_id_updated_email_messa: A new security ID shown below was assigned to your user profile. You may use this ID once to reset your password.
pas_http_user_sec_id_updated_email_burn_: Please keep this ID in a safe place and delete this e-mail as soon as possible.
pas_http_user_form_error_tos_required: You have to accept the "Terms of service" to continue your registration.
pas_http_user_verification_timeout_days: Days until link will time out
pas_http_user_verification_link_required: To complete the process you will have to use the following link.
errors_pas_http_user_banned: The user name given has been blocked by the administration. According to the Terms Of Use you are no longer allowed to use the provided services.
errors_pas_http_user_email_exists: The e-mail address given does already exist in our database.
errors_pas_http_user_locked: The user name given has been locked by the administration or the system.
errors_pas_http_user_username_exists: The user name given does already exist in our database.
errors_pas_http_user_username_or_passwor: The user name or password given is invalid.
